frame.name: Guess the Number
frame.subtitle: Win ETH by guessing right!
frame.description: A simple blockchain game on Base. Pick a number 1-10, pay a small entry fee, and if your guess matches the random number, you win the entire prize pool!
frame.ogTitle: Guess the Number - Win ETH on Base
frame.ogDescription: Play a simple guessing game on Base blockchain. Pick a number, pay to play, win the pool!
